name: ros2-workspace
description: Complete ROS 2 workspace management with intelligent build/test automation, ccache support, and smart package selection

commands.name: /colcon-build
commands.description: Build ROS 2 packages with ccache support and smart package selection

commands.name: /colcon-test
commands.description: Run ROS 2 tests with automatic result display

commands.name: /colcon-test-result
commands.description: Display detailed test results without re-running tests

features: Smart package selection based on current directory
Directory preservation - always returns to original directory

requirements.ros2: Required - Any ROS 2 distribution (Humble, Iron, Jazzy, Rolling)
requirements.ccache: Optional but recommended - Significantly speeds up rebuilds

prerequisites: colcon build tool available in PATH
Git repository initialized in your ROS 2 workspace
Optional: ccache installed (sudo apt install ccache)
notes: First run will create .ros_workspace.txt, build.sh, and colcon_build_options.yaml
All generated files are automatically added to .gitignore
Scripts are updated on every run to ensure latest version

steps: Navigate to your ROS 2 workspace: cd ~/ros2_ws
Initialize git if not already: git init
Start Claude Code with the plugin
Run /colcon-build to set up workspace and build

examples.title: Build specific package
examples.description: Navigate to package directory and build only that package with dependencies

examples.title: Test with retry
examples.description: Run tests with automatic retry on failure

examples.title: View test results
examples.description: Display detailed test results from any directory

changes: Added /colcon-test command with automatic result display
Implemented directory preservation for all commands
